title: Beautiful San Serif Used by BOOST Mobile
content:
Trying to identify the face used throughout the new BOOST Mobile identity. See it here: [http://www.boostmobile.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020165846/http:/www.boostmobile.com/ "http://www.boostmobile.com/") in all of the Flash based elements.

Below are screen grabs of some of the more distinct characters:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020165846im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PayGo_5224.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020165846im_/http:/typophile.com/files/UNLTD_4871.jpg)

All I was able to discover after some Googling was that The Attik did the design of the new identity. Figuring it would be easier to figure out here than ringing them up and asking.

Thanks.

Benjamin.
author: lovejoy

comments.content: According to the source, it's called BoostNeo Grotesk. I can't find any information on such a font, so I'm guessing it's custom.
Is there no way to get this font?
